text: Placidium acarosporoides (Mojave stipllescale) is a glossy reddish to dark brown or black squamulose lichen dotted with black perithecia that grows on rock.Field Guide to California Lichens, Stephen Sharnoff, Yale University Press, 2014, Lichen Flora of the Greater Sonoran Desert Region. Vol 1, Nash, T.H., Ryan, B.D., Gries, C., Bugartz, F., (eds.) 2001 ==References== Category:Verrucariales
title: Placidium acarosporoides
